Articles.Content:
Hello dear fellow Kerbals,

I've tried my best at making the Aegis Vanguard long range heavy fighter from star citizen in kerbal space program.

It flies if you turn off gravity, but it has a tenancy to for some reason eject some little wing panels just for fun, it's quite annoying. It needs B9 aerospace and tweakscale, aswell as infernal robotics.![BWOyYoH.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BWOyYoH.jpg)

It's mostly for the aesthetics, i tried my best! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Also my first post here, hope y'all like it!

-jappie2
